column2: You enter your Mech Suit and connect your body to the machine's frame. "ALL SYSTEMS FUNCTIONAL", it says to you. "READY FOR COMBAT DEPLOYMENT". You have decided to launch yourself through the enemy lines in your Mech Suit. No man alone can withstand the onslaught of your machine!
You enter your Mech Suit and rather than head to the front line, you aid your troops' defense and focus on keeping the enemy at bay
Stand back, I'll set up a shield!
Bring your Mech Suit to the front lines. This comes with risk
Use your Mech Suit to shore up your allies' defenses.
Bring your Mech Suit to the front lines. This comes with risk
Bring your Mech Suit to the front lines. This comes with risk
Use your Mech Suit to shore up your allies' defenses.
Bringing your Mech Suit to the front lines was a mistake. You were quickly overwhelmed by the enemy, and while you barely escaped with your life, you had to leave your Mech Suit behind

STRIKER COMBAT SYSTEMS ONLINE'. You pull the cockpit closed as you prepare to enter the battlefield. Sweating, you clutch the controls and connect to the machine's frame.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESCdestroymech.3;Your Mech Suit was damaged beyond repair in your last battle. Regretfully, you order your men to have it destroyed;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
OPTAdestroymech.3;Damn it!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
